subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: BOSTON, July 20 (AP) — Terry Francona, the manager of the Boston Red Sox, was ejected in the first inning Friday night after J. D. Drew’s drive just cleared the wall in left field but was not ruled a home run.
snippet: BOSTON, July 20 (AP) — Terry Francona, the manager of the Boston Red Sox, was ejected in the first inning Friday night after J. D. Drew’s drive just cleared the wall in left field but was not ruled a home run.
